ConfigureCX8WriteProtect.description: This action supports for PCIe CX-8 in band updates only, and users will need to manually disable #WP before the update and enable #WP after the update is completed.
ConfigureCX8WriteProtect.longDescription: This action supports for PCIe CX-8 in band updates only, and users will need to manually disable #WP before the update and enable #WP after the update is completed.

DellOemUpdateService.description: This is the complex property for the additional OEM Links.
DellOemUpdateService.longDescription: This is the complex property for the additional OEM Links.

Install.description: This action is used to install firmware inventory instances
Install.longDescription: This action shall perform install of firmware inventory instances

RecoverFirmware.description: This action shall recover BOSS controller firmware in case of root of trust (RoT) failure.
RecoverFirmware.longDescription: This action shall recover BOSS controller firmware in case of root of trust (RoT) failure.

title: #DellUpdateService
